mapper.select: select count(*) from kcd_mdxx where ckey=#{ckey}
select count(*) from kcd_mdxx where sname=#{0} and pname=#{1} and pIDcard=#{2}
mapper.insert:
insert into kcd_mdxx( id, sname, alevel, pname, pIDcard, pcall, ckey, kd, czcode, addtime, uptime )values
( #{mdxxs.id}, #{mdxxs.sname}, #{mdxxs.alevel}, #{mdxxs.pname}, #{mdxxs.pIDcard}, #{mdxxs.pcall}, #{mdxxs.ckey}, #{mdxxs.kd}, #{mdxxs.czcode}, #{mdxxs.addtime}, #{mdxxs.uptime} )
